setNextGoal

protected void setNextGoal(Goal previousGoal,
                           Goal goal)
Sets the parameters of the next goal to be executed based on the previous goal execution. This is an empty place holder for subclasses.

Parameters:
previousGoal - the previously executed goal.
goal - the goal that is going to be dispatched.
